name: Candyland Chase
description:
You drove out to a forest for a walk. When you arrived, you found your favorite walking spot is not longer birch and grass but a sweet mass of purples and cream.

Run from the slime for as long as you can.

Sprint (shift) while you have the energy for it.

Collect the sweet blue berries to get your energy back.

Collect yellow berries to keep your weight down.
